item.title: 谢因携安巴尼的信实公司重返印度，创下特伦特股价纪录
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 前谷歌工程师被控在中国从事间谍活动以促进人工智能发展
item.description: 一名曾为 Alphabet 公司旗下谷歌公司工作的中国软件工程师因涉嫌窃取商业机密以推动中国人工智能产业发展而面临美国司法部新的经济间谍指控。【原文：A Chinese software engineer who worked for Alphabet Inc.’s Google faces new charges of economic espionage by the US Justice Department for allegedly stealing trade secrets to boost China’s AI industry.】

item.title: 中国服务业增速意外放缓，尽管假日消费强劲
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，中国服务业活动意外放缓，但延续了连续数月的增长势头，原因是农历新年前后是中国最繁忙的消费旺季之一，为需求提供了支撑。【原文：China’s services activity unexpectedly slowed while extending its monthslong growth streak, a private survey showed, as one of the country’s busiest spending seasons around the Lunar New Year supported demand.】

item.title: 投资者面临关税战，中国股市复盘后下滑
item.description: 中国股市下滑，原因是投资者在结束为期一周的假期返回后对贸易紧张局势加剧做出了反应。【原文：Chinese stocks slipped as investors responded to heightened trade tensions upon their return from a week-long holiday.】

item.title: 美国直接贷款公司门罗资本在澳大利亚开设首家办事处
item.description: 美国私人信贷管理公司门罗资本有限责任公司（Monroe Capital LLC）正在澳大利亚扩张，通过开设新办事处和招聘员工，开发该国快速增长的 4.1 万亿澳元（2.6 万亿美元）养老金池。【原文：Monroe Capital LLC, a US private credit manager, is expanding in Australia to tap the nation’s fast-growing A$4.1 trillion ($2.6 trillion) pensions pool with the opening of a new office and hire.】

item.title: 中国利用液化天然气和钨关税撬动大宗商品市场
item.description: 液化天然气和钨--一种用于国防和能源工业的金属--是中美贸易战开战前线的商品。【原文：Liquefied natural gas and tungsten — a metal used in the defense and energy industries — are the commodities on the front lines of the opening salvo of the US-China trade war.】

item.title: OpenAI 的索拉（Sora）电影制作工具在好莱坞遭遇阻力
item.description: 报纸出版商以数百万美元的价格获得文章授权。唱片公司已经提起诉讼。但在人工智能的商业潜力方面，电影制片厂的起步要慢得多。【原文：Newspaper publishers have licensed articles for millions of dollars. Record labels have filed lawsuits. But when it comes to the commercial potential of artificial intelligence, movie studios are off to a much slower start.】

item.title: 在贸易战中，中国通过每日定盘价维持人民币汇率稳定
item.description: 由于与美国的贸易紧张局势升级加剧了人民币的贬值压力，中国扩大了对人民币的支持，将管理货币的每日参考汇率设定在高于 7.2 美元的水平。【原文：China extended its support for the yuan by setting its daily reference rate for the managed currency at a level stronger than 7.2 per dollar, as escalating trade tensions with the US add to the depreciation pressure on the yuan.】

item.title: 彭博经济学家称澳大利亚降息 "并非一锤定音
item.description: 彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）的詹姆斯-麦金太尔（James McIntyre）认为，澳大利亚稳固的劳动力市场、复苏的消费者、强劲的信贷增长和货币贬值都是储备银行本月降息的潜在障碍。【原文：Australia’s solid labor market, resurgent consumer, robust credit growth and depreciating currency are all potential hurdles to the Reserve Bank lowering interest rates this month, according to James McIntyre at Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 印度储备银行新行长颠覆交易员的游戏规则
item.description: 在沙克提坎塔-达斯（Shaktikanta Das）担任印度央行行长的最后两年里，卢比坚挺、流动性不断减少、利率居高不下。桑杰-马尔霍特拉看起来将打破这一模式。【原文：The last two years of Shaktikanta Das’ tenure as India’s central bank chief was marked by a rock-steady rupee, dwindling liquidity and high interest rates. Sanjay Malhotra looks set to break from that template.】

item.title: Citadel 聘请前摩根士丹利日本大宗商品主管
item.description: Citadel 正在聘用摩根士丹利 MUFG 证券公司前日本大宗商品销售主管，作为其在日本电力市场最新扩张的一部分。【原文：Citadel is hiring the former head of Japan commodities sales at Morgan Stanley MUFG Securities Co. as part of its latest expansion in the country’s power market.】

item.title: 美联储杰斐逊称官员应谨慎调整利率
item.description: 美联储副主席菲利普-杰斐逊（Philip Jefferson）表示，只要经济和劳动力市场保持强劲，政策制定者在调整利率时保持谨慎是合适的。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair Philip Jefferson said it’s appropriate for policymakers to be cautious in adjusting interest rates, as long as the economy and labor market remain strong.】

item.title: 贸易战刺激避险需求，黄金维持在历史高位附近
item.description: 由于中美贸易战的开端激起了避险需求，黄金在亚洲交易中维持在纪录高位附近，此前一个交易日上涨了近 1%。【原文：Gold held near a record high in Asian trading, after rising by almost 1% in the previous session, as the opening salvos of the US-China trade war stoked haven demand.】

item.title: 高盛继 Instacart 之后再次聘用乔瓦尼，负责 TMT 交易
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社查阅的一份内部备忘录，前高盛集团银行家尼克-乔瓦尼（Nick Giovanni）将重新加入这家投资银行，成为他曾领导的技术、媒体和电信部门的合伙人。【原文：Former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. banker Nick Giovanni is rejoining the investment bank as partner in the technology, media and telecommunications group he once led, according to an internal memo reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 爱尔兰部长提议在美国设立机构应对特朗普贸易风险
item.description: 爱尔兰外交和贸易部长将寻求批准成立一个总部设在美国的机构，该机构将就如何应对唐纳德-特朗普总统政府可能带来的政策变化向政府提供建议。【原文：Ireland’s foreign and trade minister will seek approval to establish a US-based body that will advise the government on how to deal with any potential policy changes from the administration of President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 中国农历新年票房达到创纪录的 13 亿美元
item.description: 在为期一周的春节长假期间，中国电影票房收入达到创纪录的 13 亿美元，这表明中国官员为刺激消费所做的努力正在奏效。【原文：China posted a record $1.3 billion in box office receipts over the week-long Lunar New Year holiday period, suggesting efforts by Chinese officials to boost consumer spending are working.】

item.title: 日本工资创 1997 年以来最大增幅，支持日本央行加息之路
item.description: 日本名义工资以近三十年来最快的速度增长，为日本央行最新的加息决定提供了支持，并使该行保持在进一步采取紧缩措施的轨道上。【原文：Japanese nominal wages rose at the fastest pace in nearly three decades, supporting the Bank of Japan’s latest rate hike decision and keeping the bank on track for further tightening steps.】

item.title: 安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）在地铁窒息案宣判无罪后聘用丹尼尔-彭尼（Daniel Penny
item.description: 风险投资巨头安德森-霍洛维茨公司（Andreessen Horowitz）聘请了丹尼尔-彭尼（Daniel Penny），他是一名海军陆战队退伍军人，曾因对一名情绪激动的地铁乘客使用锁喉手段而成为全国知名人士。【原文：Venture capital giant Andreessen Horowitz has hired Daniel Penny, a Marine veteran who became a national figure after he used a chokehold on an agitated subway rider.】

item.title: 贸易战担忧与伊朗压力并存，石油止跌回升
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普加大了对伊朗的经济压力，抵消了人们对中美贸易战将损害全球经济增长的担忧，石油在下跌后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied after a decline as concerns that a trade war between the US and China will hurt global growth were offset by President Donald Trump ramping up economic pressure on Iran.】

item.title: 中国市场节后重开，应对特朗普关税影响
item.description: 2025年1月2日，星期四，中国上海，浦东陆家嘴金融区的建筑。中国国家主席习近平表示，预计2024年全年中国国内生产总值将增长5%左右，这标志着这个世界第二大经济体有望实现其官方目标。【原文：Buildings in Pudong's Lujiazui Financial District in Shanghai, China, on Thursday, Jan. 2, 2025. China’s gross domestic product is expected to expand around 5% for the full year of 2024, President Xi Jinping said, signaling the world’s second-largest economy is on track to meet its official target.】

item.title: 东京今年首家上市公司股票首日交易飙升
item.description: 下一代科技集团公司（Next Generation Technology Group Inc.【原文：Next Generation Technology Group Inc., the first listing on the Tokyo Stock Exchange this year, jumped on its trading debut.】

item.title: 韩国通胀因能源和食品成本上升而回升
item.description: 由于能源和食品价格上涨，韩国的消费者通胀加速，这增加了政策制定者的担忧，因为政治动荡对本币造成了压力，而唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税言论则有可能对这个依赖贸易的经济体造成冲击。【原文：South Korea’s consumer inflation accelerated on the back of higher energy and food prices, adding to concerns for policymakers just as political turmoil weighs on the local currency and Donald Trump’s talk of tariffs threatens to sideswipe the trade-reliant economy.】

item.title: 澳大利亚主权基金在股市上涨中回报 12.2
item.description: 澳大利亚未来基金（Future Fund）2024 年的回报率达到 12.2%，原因是该主权财富基金增持了国际股票。【原文：Australia’s Future Fund posted a 12.2% return for 2024 as the sovereign wealth fund reaped the benefit of increasing positions in international equities.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德加入 Insignia 竞购狂潮，提出匹配报价
item.description: Brookfield Capital Partners (UK) Ltd. 加入了对 Insignia Financial Ltd. 的竞购狂潮，与贝恩资本和 CC Capital Partners 一起对这家澳大利亚财富管理公司提出了收购要约。【原文：Brookfield Capital Partners (UK) Ltd. entered the bidding frenzy for Insignia Financial Ltd., joining Bain Capital and CC Capital Partners with an offer for the Australian wealth management firm.】

item.title: 中国重新开放，亚洲股市追随美国股市走高：市场综述
item.description: 周三，随着交易员们在中美贸易战和华尔街大型科技公司的财报中寻找出路，亚洲股市有望高开。【原文：Asian stocks were poised to open higher on Wednesday as traders navigate their way through a US-China trade war and earnings results from Wall Street’s big tech companies.】

item.title: 特朗普改弦易辙，美国人工智能安全研究所所长将离职
item.description: 美国人工智能安全研究所（AI Safety Institute）的最高官员即将卸任，这给特朗普政府领导下的一个专注于人工智能的重要政府机构的未来带来了新的不确定性。【原文：The top official at the US AI Safety Institute is stepping down, raising new uncertainty about the future of a key government group focused on artificial intelligence under the Trump administration.】

item.title: 美国顶级炼油商准备在关税问题上改用国产原油
item.description: 美国最大的炼油商和加拿大原油的主要买家马拉松石油公司（Marathon Petroleum）认为，如果唐纳德-特朗普总统与邻国的潜在贸易战限制了外国供应，中西部工厂将有大量机会转用国产石油。【原文：Marathon Petroleum, the largest US refiner and a major buyer of Canadian crude, sees ample opportunity to switch to domestic oil at its Midwest plants should President Donald Trump’s potential trade war with neighboring countries limit access to foreign supply.】

item.title: 液化天然气贸易商将从中国关税影响美国出口中获益
item.description: 中国对来自美国的液化天然气征收报复性关税，贸易公司和一些全球最大的能源公司将从中获益。【原文：Trading houses and some of the world’s biggest energy companies stand to gain from the retaliatory tariffs China is imposing on liquefied natural gas from the US.】

item.title: 奥利奥制造商警告可可成本将使每股收益下降 10
item.description: Mondelez International Inc.表示，"前所未有的可可成本上涨 "将导致 2025 年调整后每股收益下降约 10%。【原文：Mondelez International Inc. said “unprecedented cocoa cost inflation” would drive down adjusted earnings per share in 2025 by approximately 10%.】

item.title: 价值 800 亿美元的钻石市场崩盘让德比尔斯陷入困境
item.description:
需求的下滑使戴比尔斯陷入困境，并有可能使其所有者出售曾经的行业巨头的计划受挫。【原文：

A slump in demand has left De Beers floundering — and threatens to frustrate its owner’s plans to sell what was once the titan of the industry.

】
